notes:
It spawns every 4 hours starting immediately after [[Server Save]] on [[Halloween]] (between the [[Server Save]]s of October 31 and November 3). When it spawns, the following message is broadcast to all players:
:{{Server Message|Oh noes! It's a mutated pumpkin!}}

Once the Mutated Pumpkin has been slain, a portal east of [[Darashia]] opens for 30 minutes ({{Mapper Coords|130.37|126.159|7|4|text=here}}), where all fighters can [[Skinning|skin]] the [[Slain Mutated Pumpkin|corpse]] for the achievement [[Mutated Presents]], and one of the following:
* {{Ilink|Spiderwebs}} [[Spiderwebs]]
* {{Ilink|Toy Spider}} [[Toy Spider]]
* {{Ilink|Bat Decoration}} [[Bat Decoration]]
* {{Ilink|Skeleton Decoration}} [[Skeleton Decoration]]
* {{Ilink|Yummy Gummy Worm}} 20 [[Yummy Gummy Worm]]s
* {{Ilink|Surprise Bag (Red)}} [[Surprise Bag (Red)]]
* {{Ilink|Surprise Bag (Blue)}} [[Surprise Bag (Blue)]]
* {{Ilink|Bar of Chocolate}} [[Bar of Chocolate]]
* {{Ilink|Pumpkinhead}} [[Pumpkinhead]]
* {{Ilink|Pumpkin}} [[Pumpkin]]
* {{Ilink|Candy Cane}} 50 [[Candy Cane]]s
* {{Ilink|Candy}} 50 [[Candy|Candies]]
* {{Ilink|Bar of Chocolate}} 50 [[Bar of Chocolate|Bars of Chocolate]]
The exiting portal will take the player to [[Darashia]] [[Temple]]. You will be automatically kicked out of the reward room after 5 minutes with the message "You can't bear staying in this room any longer."

<noinclude><gallery captionalign="center"  mode="nolines">
Elysiapumpk.jpg|The Mutated Pumpkin on Elysia
Mutpam.png|Reward room
</gallery></noinclude>
sounds: I had the Halloween Hare for breakfast!
Your soul will be mine...wait, wrong line
Trick or treat? I saw death!
No wait! Don't kill me! It's me, your friend!
Bunnies, bah! I'm the real thing!
I've come to avenge all those mutilated pumpkins!
You, my little mouse, are doomed.
history:
[[The Mutated Pumpkin]] was introduced during [[Halloween]] 2008. The possible rewards for defeating it were [[Spiderwebs]], [[Pumpkin]], [[Candy Cane]]s, [[Surprise Bag (Red)]], [[Bat Decoration]], [[Bar of Chocolate]], [[Skeleton Decoration]], [[Pumpkinhead]] or [[Yummy Gummy Worm]]s.

Since 2009, its body couldn't be moved or walked over as to receive the rewards, one had to use an [[Obsidian Knife]]. After using the knife, players would be teleported to [[Darashia]] [[Depot]] to prevent blocking the rewards for others. Also, [[Toy Spider]] and [[Surprise Bag (Blue)]] where added to the rewards. 

In 2013 its loot was changed to the [[Cooperative Loot System]]; every participant since then receives 5 [[Pumpkin]]s and 10 [[Yummy Gummy Worm]]s, while the rare items are awarded to players with high participation points among the fighters.

On Halloween 2011, some more {{Thread|31430650|changes}} were made to The Mutated Pumpkin invasion. Only the last twenty players who dealt damage to it were able to receive a reward (this was fixed in 2012). 50 [[Candy|Candies]] were also added to the list of possible rewards.
name: The Mutated Pumpkin
location: Spawns west of [[Darashia]] around {{Mapper Coords|129.91|126.142|7|2|text=here}} or {{Mapper Coords|129.71|126.125|7|2|text=here}} or {{Mapper Coords|129.68|126.162|7|2|text=here}} during [[Halloween]].
strategy: Try to trap it since it retargets a lot and it's very fast. Then just attack it until it's dead.
